name: Stealth Casual Farming Simulator
description:
Farm as many crops as you can. Stay away from the wolves or hide in the tall grass.

Controls

Walk with WASD
Select tool with 1, 2 and 3 (hoe, watering can, seeds)
Left click to interact

How to grow crops

  1. Till land with hoe
  2. Plant seed
  3. Water with watering can
  4. Hide from the wolves in the tall grass
  5. Harvest crops with hoe

My first game. Made for Ludum Dare 41 Compo.
